text: A Tree Grows in Brooklyn may refer to: *A Tree Grows in Brooklyn (novel), a 1943 novel by Betty Smith *A Tree Grows in Brooklyn (1945 film), the cinema adaptation of the novel *A Tree Grows in Brooklyn (musical), the stage adaptation of the novel *A Tree Grows in Brooklyn (1974 film), a 1974 American TV film based on the novel
title: A Tree Grows in Brooklyn
